```{r}
x <- 1:100
for(i in 1:3) {
  y <- x[i]^2
  print(y)
}
```

```{r}
library(magicfor)

magic_for()

x <- 1:100
for(i in 1:3) {
  y <- x[i] * 2
  print(y)
}

result <- magic_result()
result$y
```

```{r}
x <- 1:100
for(i in 1:3) {
  y <- x[i] * 2
  print(y)
  z <- x[i] ** 2
  print(z)
}
```

```{r}
magic_for()

x <- 1:100
for(i in 1:3) {
  y <- x[i] * 2
  print(y)
  z <- x[i] ** 2
  print(z)
}

result <- magic_result()
unlist(result$y)
unlist(result$z)
```
